translated: Whatever beings there are

original: zhes bya ba la rgyun du gnas shing gcig tu rgyud le zhen par 'dug pa zhes bstan pa yin no//
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rgyun du gnas shing gcig tu rgyud le zhen par 'dug pa zhes bstan pa yin no//
translated: It is taught that they abide in continuity and are attached to a single continuum.

original: gcig tu rgyud la zhen par 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni tshor ba de nyid rgyud la zhen pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig tu rgyud la zhen par 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni tshor ba de nyid rgyud la zhen pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: They are attached to a single continuum means that they are attached to that feeling in the continuum.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi ste /
translated: The basis of the afflictions is also the cause of suffering.

original: nyes par spyod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni sdom pa ma yin pa la sogs pa spyod pa de la gcig tu zhen pa dang / rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyes par spyod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni sdom pa ma yin pa la sogs pa spyod pa de la gcig tu zhen pa dang / rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The affliction of faulty action is the adherence to that action which is not a vow, etc., and the definite production of an undesirable karmic maturation.

original: sred pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'dod pa rnams kyis bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pas 'dod pa'i rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sred pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'dod pa rnams kyis bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pas 'dod pa'i rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The affliction of craving is the non-abandonment of craving for the sense objects, because of the non-existence of the maturation of the sense objects.

original: lta ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni phyi rol pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa kha cig sdug bsngal du zhugs su zin kyang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu med pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni phyi rol pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa kha cig sdug bsngal du zhugs su zin kyang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu med pa lta bu'o //
translated: The affliction of view is the adherence to the view of the non-existence of the result of action, as in the case of some non-Buddhists who adhere to the view of the non-existence of the result of action.

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni bde ba dang mi ldan zhing sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni bde ba dang mi ldan zhing sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The affliction of affliction is the non-possession of pleasure and the production of suffering.

original: de la mngon par dga' ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: de la mngon par dga' ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya bas ni /
translated: The nature of delight in that is the affliction of delight.

original: de la mngon par dga' ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la mngon par dga' ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching on the delight in that.

original: bdag pa / byi dor lhur len pa'i sems can zhes bya bas ni yul la gcig tu zhen pa bstan to //
analyzed: bdag pa / byi dor lhur len pa'i sems can zhes bya bas ni yul la gcig tu zhen pa bstan to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbeings who are devoted to the care of their own bodies‚Äù shows the attachment to objects.

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa ni phyin ci log tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa ni phyin ci log tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who have entered a bad path‚Äù are those who have entered a wrong path.

original: de dag ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams la ci rigs par shes par bya'o sems can rnam pa lnga la bya rnam pa lngas snyan par smra ba la sogs pas gnas te /
analyzed: de dag ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams la ci rigs par shes par bya'o sems can rnam pa lnga la bya rnam pa lngas snyan par smra ba la sogs pas gnas te /
translated: These five types of beings should be understood as they apply to householders and to those who have gone forth into the homeless state.

original: rang bzhin tu gnas pa dang / 'phel ba thob pa dang / 'jigs pa dang ldan pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / rigs pa la rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin tu gnas pa dang / 'phel ba thob pa dang / 'jigs pa dang ldan pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / rigs pa la rmongs pa'o //
translated: There are five types of beings who are to be helped by the bodhisattvas through the practice of agreeable speech and the other means of gathering students: those who are established in their own natures, those who are established in the practice of virtue, those who are frightened, those who have entered the wrong path, and those who are confused about what is right.üîΩThe order in which these are presented corresponds to the order in which the bodhisattvas‚Äô agreeable speech, etc.,

original: de dag gi rim pa ni legs par smra bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: de dag gi rim pa ni legs par smra bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o//
translated: are applied to them.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The following is an example of this.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i le'u las rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i le'u las rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
translated: It should be understood from the chapter on the means of gathering a following.

original: gong du bstan pa'i stobs bskyed pa gnas pa de nyid la 'dir bstan pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i stobs bskyed pa gnas pa de nyid la 'dir bstan pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro /
translated: The power of generation taught above is the same as the station taught here.

original: @256a * // yang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar bab pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: @256a * // yang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar bab pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said that he is not frightened by the various sufferings of cyclic existence that arise.

original: sbyin pa rnam pa lngas ni lag rkyong ba la gnas pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyin pa rnam pa lngas ni lag rkyong ba la gnas pa bstan pa yin te /
translated: The five kinds of generosity teach the station of openhandedness.

original: de la gnas nas de la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnas nas de la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Having stood in that, one enters into it.

original: don zab pa ni zab mo'o //
analyzed: don zab pa ni zab mo'o //
translated: The profound meaning is the profound.

original: yi ge zab pa ni zab par snang ba ste /
analyzed: yi ge zab pa ni zab par snang ba ste /
translated: The profound expression is the appearance of the profound.

original: kha cig ni zab pa nyid yin la zab par snang ba yang yod la /
analyzed: kha cig ni zab pa nyid yin la zab par snang ba yang yod la /
translated: Some are profound but not the appearance of the profound.

original: kha cig ni zab pa ma yin pa la zab par snang pa yin pa yod pas de gnyis ka las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir gnyis smos so //
analyzed: kha cig ni zab pa ma yin pa la zab par snang pa yin pa yod pas de gnyis ka las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir gnyis smos so //
translated: Some are not profound, but appear to be profound. Therefore, both are mentioned in order to distinguish the profound from the non-profound.

original: chos la bdag med pa la gsal bar byed pas stong pa nyid dang rab tu ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos la bdag med pa la gsal bar byed pas stong pa nyid dang rab tu ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with emptiness, because it illuminates the selflessness of phenomena.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung bas bdag med pa la 'jug pa gsal bar byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung bas bdag med pa la 'jug pa gsal bar byed pa nyid de /
translated: It illuminates the engagement in the selflessness of dependent origination in forward order,

original: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it illuminates the aspects of impermanence, etc.

original: de ltar na mdo bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mdo bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is the explanation of the sutra.

original: ltung ba la mkhas pa la sogs pa ni 'du la ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba la mkhas pa la sogs pa ni 'du la ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: The expertise in downfalls, etc. is the instruction in the Vinaya.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par 'jog pa ni ma mo bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par 'jog pa ni ma mo bstan pa'o //
translated: The presentation of the characteristics of the unmistaken dharma is the instruction in the Abhidharma.

original: dgongs pa can gyi bka'i don ni dgongs pa can no //
analyzed: dgongs pa can gyi bka'i don ni dgongs pa can no //
translated: The meaning of the speech that is intentional is the intentional.

original: de nyid ni drangs nas bshad par bya ba yin pas brtag dka' ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni drangs nas bshad par bya ba yin pas brtag dka' ba ste /
translated: Since it is to be explained after being drawn out, it is difficult to analyze.

original: chos rnams kyi brda'i don zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi brda'i don zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the symbols of the teachings is taught.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i don nying yin pa'i phyir don rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i don nying yin pa'i phyir don rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: The discernment of the meaning is because of the very meaning that is desired.

original: brjod du med pa'i tshig gi don thams cad la mkhas pa ni gnas lnga pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i tshig gi don thams cad la mkhas pa ni gnas lnga pa'o //
translated: The fifth abode is the skill in all the meanings of inexpressible words.

original: zab mo'i don la mngon par dgongs pa ni don zab mo dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zab mo'i don la mngon par dgongs pa ni don zab mo dgongs pa'o //
translated: The profound meaning is the intention.

original: de nges par 'grel pa ni de'i dgongs pa dang bsam pa rab tu ston pa ste /
analyzed: de nges par 'grel pa ni de'i dgongs pa dang bsam pa rab tu ston pa ste /
translated: The explanation of that is the teaching of its intention and thought.

original: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: ji skad bstan pa'i gnas rnam pa lngas 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas nyid do //
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i gnas rnam pa lngas 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas nyid do //
translated: The five kinds of abodes that were taught are the abodes of that.

original: snying brtse ba'i phan yon lnga bstan pa'i phyir thog ma nyid du kho na spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni kho na med pa'i rgyu la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: snying brtse ba'i phan yon lnga bstan pa'i phyir thog ma nyid du kho na spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni kho na med pa'i rgyu la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: In order to teach the five benefits of compassion, he says, ‚ÄúFirst, one abandons hostility,‚Äù because one enters into the cause of the absence of hostility.

analyzed: ngag gi nyes par spyod pa ni bdag dang gzhan la gnod par skyed pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: The verbal misdeed is the cause of generating harm to oneself and others.

translated: The antidote to that, pleasant speech, is the cause of gathering oneself and others.

original: tshig gzung bar 'os pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig gzung bar 'os pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Pleasant speech is worthy of being taken to heart because it is non-deceptive.

original: brtan pa ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir le lo dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtan pa ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir le lo dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Steadfastness is the cause of being free from laziness because it is the essence of effort.

original: dka' ba'i las kyis bag mi 'khums pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dka' ba'i las kyis bag mi 'khums pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The mind becomes very joyful because it is not discouraged by difficult tasks.

original: bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas gnyi ga'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas gnyi ga'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Patience is the cause of accomplishing the aims of both oneself and others because it is the essence of patience.
